column4: is there a way to set like a package checkpoint,  ie say i have the system at a good point,  and I wanna try installing some stuff that may be problemaTIC but what I'd like is to have a checkpoint that I can revert to to remove all the extra packages brought in from the set I have to install
remember which ones you installed afterwards
each time you do it, add that package to a text file
unneeded dependencies will remove when you remove the parent applications
